## Descriptive analysis

### Foliar Diseases

```{r reading the foliar disease data, message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
PhenoData <- readRDS(here::here("output", "DadosDoencasv2.RDS"))
```


#### Fig 1. Barplots of cassava foliar disease traits
```{r figure1, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.height = 3, fig.width = 3}
#tiff(filename = here::here("output", "Fig1_BarplotsCassavaFoliarDiseaseTraits.tiff"), res = 350,
#     compression = "lzw", units = "cm", height = 8, width = 12)
PhenoData %>% filter(!is.na(traits), !is.na (Y)) %>%
  group_by(traits, Y) %>%
  summarise(y = n()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = traits, y = y, fill = as.character(Y))) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill", stat = "identity") +
  scale_fill_brewer(type = "div", palette = 7) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(title = "Score")) +
  theme_bw()
#dev.off()
```

#### Fig 2. Distribution plots of cassava foliar disease traits
```{r figure2, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.height = 4, fig.width = 3}
#tiff(filename = here::here("output", "Fig2_DenplotsCassavaFoliarDiseaseTraits.tiff"), res = 350,
#     compression = "lzw", units = "cm", width = 12, height = 8)
PhenoData %>% ggplot(aes(x = Y)) + geom_density(adjust = 3, fill = "darkgreen") + 
  facet_wrap(~ traits, scales = "free_x") + xlab("Scores") +
  theme(legend.position="none",
        panel.spacing = unit(0.1, "lines"),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank()) +
  theme_bw()
#dev.off()
```


### Yield Traits

```{r reading the yield data, message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
PhenoData <- readRDS(here::here("output", "DadosFenotipicos.rds"))
```


#### Fig 3. Distribution plots of cassava yield traits
```{r figure3, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, fig.height = 4, fig.width = 3}
#tiff(filename = here::here("output", "Fig3_DenplotsCassavaAgronomicTraits.tiff"), res = 350,
#     compression = "lzw", units = "cm", height = 25, width = 20)
PhenoData %>% ggplot(aes(x = y)) +
  geom_density(adjust = 3, fill = "darkgreen") + 
  facet_wrap(~ Trait, scales = "free", ncol = 2) +
  theme(legend.position="none",
        panel.spacing = unit(0.1, "lines"),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank()) +
  theme_bw()
#dev.off()
```
